homeSection.title: PESB2 Group
homeSection.description: Proteing engineering, Simulations, Bioinformatics and Computational Biology

postTitle.title: A multidisciplinary group
postTitle.description: We are a group with experts in research related to biological systems, applying mathematical modeling techniques, bioinformatics, machine learning, data mining and experimental techniques. The use of different approaches allows us to be a multidisciplinary group with great capacities in different areas of research.

section1.descSection: Mathematical modeling is applied to the study of complex systems, in order to understand the mechanisms behind them.

section2.descSection: Protein engineering focuses on the study of proteins and the understanding of their properties for industrial or commercial applications.

section3.descSection: We use ML and data mining for manipulation of large volumes of data and that allows predicting behaviors, optimizing experimental processes.

section4.descSection: We know and apply different bioinformatics techniques at genomic studies, simulations of proteins interactions and computational biology.
